## ThemeLoadOptions.resolveDefinitions property

Whether to resolve `ref` expressions in `definition` and `styles` elements.

 `false`<!-- -->, as datasources resolve definitions in \[\[StyleSetEvaluator\]\].

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
resolveDefinitions?: boolean;
```
